title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.40 - Loitering prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.40 - Loitering prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall loiter in or about any toilet area, waiting
room, or any other location in or upon the airport. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
78.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
